DIA_Roderich_HELLO_03_01: Hello, stranger! What brings you to me?
DIA_Roderich_HELLO_03_03: I'm very busy, I don't have time to chat. If there's a case you want to make, keep it brief.
DIA_Roderich_Who_03_02: My name is Roderich and I am the commander of the guard in the city of Archolos.
DIA_Roderich_Who_03_03: Additionally, I serve on the Governor's City Council.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_15_00: I'd like to join the city guard.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_13_01: The guard will gladly accept a new recruit into its ranks, but we only accept citizens of Archolos.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_13_02: Do you have your citizenship certificate with you?
DIA_Roderich_Q203_NO_13_01: Then who let you in here in the first place?
DIA_Roderich_Q203_NO_13_02: Don't even think I'd accept someone who's just arrived on the island into the guard.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_NO_13_03: Talk to Matey, he's the official in charge of civic affairs.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_YES_13_01: All right, boy. We got the first thing out of the way.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_YES_13_02: Now tell me, why do you want to join the city guard?
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_15_00: There is an issue I want to address as a guard...
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_01: The guard is not a place to deal with your personal business.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_15_02: This is no business! This is about my brother. He's missing and nobody can do anything about it.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_03: Not in that tone, boy! Don't forget who you're talking to!
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_04: As for your brother's disappearance, I understand you have already notified one of my men of the matter.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_15_05: My brother and I are not from Archolos - reason enough for everyone to wash their hands of his disappearance.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_15_06: I had hoped that by becoming a guard I could handle the investigation myself.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_07: The sad truth is that we do not currently have the manpower to deal with non-citizens.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_08: Normally, guards associated with an investigation are not allowed to handle it, but due to an exceptional situation, I might consider an exception.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_09: I'm not promising anything, but thank you for your honesty.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_lookingforJorn_13_10: Granted, you've suggested violating some important guard rules, but in a crisis I'd rather have someone trustworthy with me than one who knows the entire code by heart.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_15_00: So what's it like to work in the guard?
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_13_01: It's boring and tedious most of the time, and dirty and bloody the rest.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_13_02: The pay is not very high as the war goes on and the funds largely go to our boys at the front, but you must remember one thing.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_13_03: While they are fighting an external enemy, our job is to protect the integrity of the Kingdom, and that is a reward in itself.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_13_04: If it weren't for us, the city would have been on the edge of the abyss long ago, and any scumbag would have been holding the city government by the throat.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_13_07: Now listen to me carefully. Since we don't accept just anyone into our ranks, you'll have to prove that you're a suitable candidate for guard.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_howisit_13_09: Tell me, can you swing a sword? Can you kill a scavenger?
DIA_Roderich_Q203_goodfighter_13_02: Tomorrow morning, in the main square, there will be a training session for recruits, during which ranger Winstan will test your skills in melee combat.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_goodfighter_13_03: If you are serious about serving, I expect you to be there.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_goodfighter_15_00: I happened to chase away a couple of meatbugs.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_goodfighter_13_01: Well, that may not be enough.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_badfighter_15_00: Or even a whole dozen of them!
DIA_Roderich_Q203_badfighter_13_01: I doubt such boasts have any truth to them, but you're not lacking in spunk, boy.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_badfighter_13_02: Let's see if you're as fit as you claim.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_badfighter_15_03: You want me to beat a scavenger as a test?
DIA_Roderich_Q203_badfighter_13_04: No, that's not what I meant.
DIA_Roderich_JOINMILITIA_Description: Yes, I'm ready to be a guard.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_03: We are gathered here today to welcome the new guards among us.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_04: Boys, you will now take an oath to become brothers of the sword and protectors of our city. You will have to trust and rely on each other.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_05: I know you're nervous, so we'll get started without further extension.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_06: Place your right hand on your chest and repeat after me.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_07: I swear to serve the city and its government.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_11: Be a shield to its citizens and a sword to its enemies.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_12: Obey the laws granted by the sole and undivided grace of the King of Myrtana.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_13: Perform duties faithfully and uphold the good name of the guard.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_14: Never draw a weapon for an unjust cause.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_15: And if the time comes, to give my life in the line of duty.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_31: Now that we're past the official part of the ceremony, it's time to celebrate.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_32: Just don't you think to overdo it with alcohol!
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_03_33: You are to be ready for duty first thing in the morning!
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_15_08: I swear to serve the city and its government.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_15_09: I swear to serve the city and its king.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_15_10: I swear to serve the city and its rulers.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_15_16: Be a shield to its citizens and a sword to its enemies.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_15_17: Be a shield for its citizens and a sword to its enemy.
DIA_Roderich_Q203_Vow_Yes_15_18: To be a shield to its enemies and a sword to its citizens.
